options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for MailGuard 365. You can get MailGuard 365 custom log data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable this data connector in the Data Connector gallery after this Solution deploys. This data connector creates custom log table(s) MailGuard365_Threats_CL in your Microsoft Sentinel / Azure Log Analytics workspace.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs workbooks. Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data monitoring, analysis, and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into one or many data sources from Microsoft Sentinel and combine them into unified interactive experiences.

This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs hunting queries for MailGuard 365 that you can run in Microsoft Sentinel. These hunting queries will be deployed in the Hunting gallery of your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Run these hunting queries to hunt for threats in the Hunting gallery after this Solution deploys.
Query searches for high confidence threats stopped by MailGuard 365. It depends on the MailGuard365 data connector and MailGuard365 data type and MailGuard365 parser.
Query searches for malware threats stopped by MailGuard 365. It depends on the MailGuard365 data connector and MailGuard365 data type and MailGuard365 parser.
Query searches for phishing threats stopped by MailGuard 365. It depends on the MailGuard365 data connector and MailGuard365 data type and MailGuard365 parser.
